mainText: For someone I never knew personally Steve Jobs had a big impact on my life.  My first computer when I was a child (The Apple II) was his creation and without it there is no doubt that my childhood would have been a much lonelier time and I don't think I ever would have developed the love of learning that I have come to enjoy.  Thank you Steve.  You will be missed
header: For someone I never knew personally...
author: Joseph
